00011 #ifndef CONFIGFUNCTOR_h 
00012 #define CONFIGFUNCTOR_h 
00013 
00030 template <typename readfunc, typename writefunc>
00031 class ConfigFunctor : public VParameterNode{
00032 public:
00033   ConfigFunctor(const readfunc& r, const writefunc& w, 
00034                 const std::string& key="", const std::string& helptext="") : 
00035     VParameterNode(key, helptext), reader(r), writer(w) { _node_type=FUNCTION;}
00036   ~ConfigFunctor(){}
00037   
00038   std::istream& ReadFrom(std::istream& in, bool dummy=0){ return reader(in);}
00039   std::ostream& WriteTo(std::ostream& out, int dummy=0){ return writer(out);}
00040 private:
00041   readfunc reader;
00042   writefunc writer;
00043 };
00044 
00046 struct ConfigFunctorDummyRead{
00047   std::istream& operator()(std::istream& in){ return in; }
00048 };
00050 struct ConfigFunctorDummyWrite{
00051   std::ostream& operator()(std::ostream& out){ return out; }
00052 };
00053 
00054 
00055 #endif
